description: It is said in fairy tales that a Great Fairy fallen in battle will often ask forgiveness. That lingering need will persist as Stray Fairies wander the world seeking it out.
tooltip: It is said in fairy tales that a Great Fairy fallen in battle will often ask forgiveness. That lingering need will persist as Stray Fairies wander the world seeking it out. (Great Fairies now spawn a pair of Stray Fairies when slain)
